title: How LBJ met a pope in NYC, and more papal visit photos
content:
Pope Francis Visit News • New York 
 Upload Photo      Caption / Share  
April 20, 2008: Pope Benedict XVI is greeted by Vice President Dick Cheney and his wife Lynne at Kennedy Airport for a farewell ceremony for the pope during his visit to the United States. (Credit: Newsday / Thomas A. Ferrara) 
 1 of 37   
Share this photo      
  Buy photo          
September 2, 2015 10:51 AM 
 
In 1965 Pope Paul VI made the first papal visit to the United States. A half-century later, Pope Francis is scheduled to attend the World Meeting of Families in Philadelphia in September 2015, and visit New York City and Washington, D.C. See photos from past papal visits.
